children.name: content_column_width
children.label: Content Content Width
children.inline_help_text: Width of main content column as percentage of container

children.name: featured_column_width
children.label: Featured Content Width
children.inline_help_text: Width of featured content column as percentage of container

children.name: content_gap
children.label: Content Gap
children.inline_help_text: Space between main and featured content

children.name: background_type
children.label: Background Type
children.help_text: For background video options, see Content > ADVANCED: Background Video

children.name: add_overlay
children.label: Add Overlay
children.help_text: For overlay options see the Overlay tab of the background styles

children.name: parallax
children.label: Parallax
children.help_text: For basic parallax use Simple. For more options use Advanced.

children.name: parallax_strength
children.label: Parallax Strength
children.help_text: Larger numbers will have greater visual effect

children.name: header_tag
children.label: Header Tag
children.help_text: Only use 1 H1 per page above the fold

children.name: scale_header
children.label: Scale Header
children.help_text: Create a big, bold, responsive headline
children.inline_help_text: Make heading responsive by linearly scaling text between two values

children.name: scaled_header_options
children.label: Scaled Header Options
children.help_text: Customize minimum and maximum font sizes for linear scaling

children.name: minimum_font_size
children.label: Minimum Font Size
children.help_text: For accessibility purposes, this value should be greater than 15px
children.inline_help_text: Size of font on the smallest possible screen width (320px)

children.name: maximum_font_size
children.label: Maximum Font Size
children.help_text: The largest possible font size for the heading in this section
children.inline_help_text: Size of font on the largest screen width for average users (1600px)

children.name: select_block_type
children.label: Select Block Type
children.inline_help_text: Choose from presets or select custom to access advanced options

children.name: select_block_style
children.label: Select Block Style
children.inline_help_text: Choose from presets or select custom to access advanced options

children.name: select_block_orientation
children.label: Select Block Layout
children.inline_help_text: Choose from presets or select custom to access advanced options

children.name: button_styles
children.label: Button Styles
children.help_text: Custom primary, secondary, or submit button options
children.inline_help_text: Customize the buttons for this section

children.name: enable_module
children.label: Enable Module
children.help_text: Turn the section off without deleting your content

children.name: title
children.label: Title
children.help_text: A user-centric headline featuring a pain point or solution benefit

children.name: small_title
children.label: Small Title
children.help_text: A user-centric headline featuring a pain point or solution benefit

children.name: content
children.label: Content
children.help_text: Add more about benefits and a strong call-to-action

children.name: cta
children.label: CTA
children.help_text: Choose a button, HubSpot CTA, or modal form

children.name: featured_content
children.label: Featured Content
children.help_text: Choose image, video, form, CTA, or blocks

children.name: featured_image
children.label: Featured Image
children.help_text: Use .png if image contains transparency, otherwise use .jpg

children.name: show_advanced_image_options
children.label: Show Advanced Image Options
children.help_text: Scale and add X and Y offsets

children.name: allow_overflow
children.label: Allow Overflow
children.help_text: Hidden by default to prevent background objects overflowing

children.name: style_subscribe_horizontally
children.label: Style Subscribe Horizontally
children.help_text: If you're only asking for an email, try this horizontal style

children.name: video_link
children.label: Video Link
children.help_text: For Vimeo, use URL ending in video ID. For YouTube, use URL ending with "watch?v=" + video ID.

children.name: disable_animations
children.label: Disable Animations
children.help_text: Toggle animation display without deleting the objects
children.inline_help_text: Prevent all animations for this section

children.name: animations
children.label: Animations
children.help_text: Choose and customize up to one per target
children.inline_help_text: Add animation to a specific target element such as headings or content

children.name: animation_style
children.label: Animation Style
children.inline_help_text: Choose from presets or enable custom options

children.name: custom_animation_options
children.label: Custom Animation Options
children.help_text: Options include delay, duration, scale, opacity, and origin

children.name: scale
children.label: Scale
children.help_text: Set to 0 to create zoom-in effect

children.name: distance
children.label: Distance
children.help_text: Larger numbers will create larger effects

children.name: opacity
children.label: Opacity
children.help_text: Set to 0 to fade target in
